Content:
How is the project running
It is running 
On schedule
Smoothly
With some delays

What part of the project have you completed so far
We have just completed the  phase
Planning
Market research
Data analysis

Did you have any problems during the project
We had problems with 
Team communication
The deadline
The budget

What's been done to solve the problems
To solve the problems we have 
Changed the schedule
Tried a new process
Provided more training

What is the next step in the project plan
The next step in the project plan is 
Finalize the scope
Allocate tasks to members
Review the outcome

What methods will you use to speed up the progress
To speed up the progress we will 
Use technology
Prioritize some tasks
Motivate team members

Can you give me a brief overview of your idea
My idea is to create a 
Working process
Customer loyalty program
Line of products

How does this idea fit into our business strategy
It fits into our strategy of 
Boosting sales revenue
Promoting innovation
Expanding market shares

What is the risk of this idea
It includes 
Technical difficulties
Higher costs
Market competition

What can you do to mitigate these risks
To mitigate the risk I can 
Work with departments
Do more research
Educate our employees

What will you do next if the idea is approved
I will 
Gather a team
Create an action plan
Hire additional staff

Why will you start with that
It is the 
Urgent task
Important aspect
Cost-effective option

How was the last month's revenue compared to the previous period
The data showed 
A steady increase of 10 percent
A sharp fall of five hundred million dong
Significiant fluctuations

Where does the revenue mainly come from
The majority of our revenue comes from 
Online sales through our e-commerce platform
Customized solutions for enterprise clients
The sales of our flagship product

What is the market share of our main product compared to our rivals
Our product holds 20 percent of the market share which is  our closest competitors
Ahead of
Modest compared to
Relatively balanced among

What is your tentative revenue forecast for the coming months
I foresee a  in revenue for the coming months
A gradual improvement
Slight dip
Plateau

What makes you think so
We realize 
A growing demand for our product
Upcoming difficulties of the low season for sale
The potential of targeted marketing campaigns to drive sales

In your opinion what is the highest priority
The highest priority is to 
Address the critical issues mentioned
Launch a new marketing campaign to boost sales
Resolve any customer complaints

What is the simplest way to get that job done
The simplest way to get that job done would be to 
Outsource the project
Utilize data-driven insights
Employ automation tools

What is the important updates that we need to take note of
There wereupdates about 
Market trends
A PR crisis
Unexpected delays in the delivery

What will we discuss in the next meeting
In the next meeting we should discuss 
Updates on the progress of the project
Plans for the upcoming product launch
The budget allocation

When can we discuss further
We can discuss further 
On next monday
In the late afternoon on friday
In the early afternoon on thursday
